AHHHHH
Whenever Bob sends an e-mail all I see for the WHOLE msg is :

What the heck? I am currently using Netscape e-mail(lol,its pretty good

got pretty much everything else, whats the prob?

> From: Cristie <cristie@...>
>
> Hmm..well it doesn't appear I'm the only one having problems reading

> sent in looked the same. I use Eudora pro so its not som funky off the
> wall program that doesn't ready anything but normal text. Has html
> capacity and the whole nine yards.
>
